alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Ottawa (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lakeshore Flood Warning issued March 03 at 10:11PM EST until March 04 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...LAKESHORE FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Significant lakeshore flooding. * WHERE...Lucas and Ottawa Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads closed and low lying property including parking lots, lawns, and homes and businesses will be inundated near the lake. Some shoreline erosion will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...At 9:48 PM EST, the water level at Toledo was 73.7 inches above low water datum. Flood stage is 72 inches. The water level in the western basin will fluctuate and minor lakeshore flooding is expected through early Saturday morning as northeasterly winds of 25 to 35 knots shift to northerly and then to northwesterly, and waves remain as large as 5 to 9 feet.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
